data.convo: What's the matter here ? Somebody broke into my house in the morning . When did you find out ? About 12 o'clock , when I came home from work . Apparently forced entry . The lock is battered to pieces . I wonder how the burglar did it . He is so unskillful . I have never seen such an awkward burglar . That's because we have a strong lock . Probably . Let's check the inside then . Did you find anything ? Yes , the house was in a terrible mess . It was almost turned upside down by the burglar . Oh , er ... sorry that's because we didn't have time to clean it . You mean it is not created by the burglar ? Definitely not , sir .
